vehicles.name: Tesla Model S
vehicles.mileage: Claimed range of up to 652 km on a single charge
vehicles.description: The Tesla Model S is a luxury electric sedan known for its performance, range, and advanced technology. It offers a spacious interior, premium features, and Tesla's Autopilot driver assistance system.

vehicles.name: Tesla Model Y
vehicles.mileage: Claimed range of up to 540 km on a single charge
vehicles.description: The Tesla Model Y is a mid-size electric SUV offering a blend of practicality and performance. It shares many similarities with the Model 3 but provides more cargo space and SUV-like features.

vehicles.name: Tesla Cybertruck
vehicles.price: Starting price expected to be around ₹40 Lakh (unconfirmed)
vehicles.mileage: Claimed range of up to 800 km (for the top-tier model)
vehicles.description: The Tesla Cybertruck is an electric pickup truck with a futuristic and angular design. It promises impressive performance, towing capacity, and off-road capabilities. However, production and delivery timelines are subject to change.

vehicles.name: Tesla Model 3
vehicles.mileage: Claimed range of up to 652 km on a single charge (depending on the variant)
vehicles.description: The Tesla Model 3 is a mid-size electric sedan known for its sleek design, efficient performance, and advanced technology. It offers a comfortable interior, a spacious trunk, and Tesla's Autopilot driver assistance system.
